definition: the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1] and twelve earthly branches 十二枝/sexagenary cycle
to concern/to interfere/shield/stem
surname Zhi
to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions

sentences.english: In the lunar calendar, the years are designated by the Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches.
Constructing tributary-control projects and expanding the flood-discharge capacity of the lower- middle streams of major rivers.
sentences.chinese: 建設干支流控制工程，擴大中下游行洪能力。

sentences.english: A water transport network connecting trunk and branch lines has been established.
sentences.chinese: 初步形成干支銜接的水運網。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, when did the way of numbering the years with Gan-Zhi start, different people have different versions.
sentences.chinese: 但，從什麼時候開始以干支來紀年卻有不同說法。

sentences.english: Several funeral processions were massing, ready to march to cemeteries.
sentences.chinese: 街道上聚集起了若干支送葬的隊伍，將要向墓地前進。

sentences.english: Ancient Chinese people invented the method to designate the years by the Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches.
sentences.chinese: 中國古人發明了用“干支”紀年的方法。

definition: the 12 earthly branches 子[zi3], 丑[chou3], 寅[yin2], 卯[mao3], 辰[chen2], 巳[si4], 午[wu3], 未[wei4], 申[shen1], 酉[you3], 戌[xu1], 亥[hai4], used cyclically in the calendar and as ordinal numbers I, II etc
the 10 heavenly stems 甲[jia3], 乙[yi3], 丙[bing3], 丁[ding1], 戊[wu4], 己[ji3], 庚[geng1], 辛[xin1], 壬[ren2], 癸[gui3], used cyclically in the calendar and as ordinal numbers I, II etc
typical weather in a given season
forty-ninth year I1 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1972 or 2032
51st year A3 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1974 or 2034
menstruation/woman's period
the ten Heavenly Stems 甲[jia3], 乙[yi3], 丙[bing3], 丁[ding1], 戊[wu4], 己[ji3], 庚[geng1], 辛[xin1], 壬[ren2], 癸[gui3] (used cyclically in the calendar and as ordinal number like Roman I, II, III)
fifty-second year B4 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1975 or 2035
thirty-fifth year E11 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1958 or 2018
same as 天干/the 10 heavenly stems 甲, 乙, 丙, 丁, 戊, 己, 庚, 辛, 壬, 癸 (used cyclically in the calendar and as ordinal number like Roman I, II, III)
sixtieth year J12 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1983 or 2043
thirty-sixth year F12 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1959 or 2019
fifth year E5 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1988 or 2048
fifty-seventh year G9 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1980 or 2040
thirty-ninth year I3 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1962 or 2022
twenty-sixth year F2 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 2009 or 2069
